subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Federer, the No. 2 seed and a 17-time Grand Slam champion, has won his first three matches at Roland Garros in straight sets, beating 88th-ranked Damir Dzumhur by 6-4, 6-3, 6-2.
snippet: Federer, the No. 2 seed and a 17-time Grand Slam champion, has won his first three matches at Roland Garros in straight sets, beating 88th-ranked Damir Dzumhur by 6-4, 6-3, 6-2.
